name: Farming Isle
description:
Farming Isle

Your dear old Nan left you her farm, with the hope you'd be able to live out a peaceful life, unfortunately the island has become infested with all manner of hostile creatures!

It's up to you to save up enough gold to evacuate the isle. Farm crops in your farm to sell at the local shop. Or go out slaying the foul monster to gain better equipment and loot their gold, only then will you be able to escape this cursed farming isle!

To play, download the .Zip, extract the file and run the .exe
